class.name: CSharpScript
class.brief_description: A script implemented in the C# programming language, saved with the [code].cs[/code] extension (Mono-enabled builds only).
class.description: This class represents a C# script. It is the C# equivalent of the [GDScript] class and is only available in Mono-enabled Godot builds.

method.name: new
method.description: Returns a new instance of the script.
